titleStmt.title: A salutation of love and tender good-vvill to the commissioners of the peace for the county of Bucks, and such others in that county, and also throughout the nation, as are concerned in the contents hereof.
titleStmt.author: Penington, Isaac, 1616-1679.

notesStmt.note: Suggested place of publication and imprint date from Wing.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
